p: The biochemical data were statistically analyzed by one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) with software Past3, version 3.15., using either Tukey Honestly Significant Difference (HSD) or the Mann-Whitney test according to the variance homogeneity (Levene test), with a cut-off significance of p < 0.05 (letters). The linear correlation between the antioxidant constituents and antioxidant scavenging activity (DPPH) was determined using Microsoft Excel Â® 2013 (Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, WA, USA).
